Testimonials.name: Your BUSD gets locked into the blockchain smart contract and you are rewarded with 5% daily returns.

Testimonials.text: Why is 5 compounds mandatory before claiming?
Testimonials.name: This feature is to ensure the longevity of the project. There is a compound counter that keeps track of the number of times you've compounded since your last mine purchase or claim.
We encourage you to use the battle-tested 10/1 strategy. It is known to provide the best results and receive the initial back in 4-6 weeks. After that period, you'll be playing with the house money.

The 3 biggest deposit addresses will be rewarded respectively $350, $100, and $50 worth of miners. The reward will be deposited directly into your current earnings at the end of the Jackpot. Jackpots are drawn every 7 days.

After connecting your wallet to the site, your referral link will appear. Sharing this link will earn you 5% of all deposits made by your referral. These rewards can be compounded or withdrawn at any time.

Testimonials.text: I'm stuck. Who can help me?
Testimonials.name: The BUSD Miner team and community are available on Telegram to help with any onboarding questions.

Features.title: Verified and Safe
Features.text: The BUSD Miner runs securely on the Binance Smart Chain. Our smart contract is renounced and can not be changed once it's deployed.

Features.title: Platform Support
Features.text: The team is available 24/7 through Telegram to help with onboarding, claiming rewards, and general support.

Features.title: Community Driven
Features.text: The success, direction, and sustainment of the project is achieved through our strong community engagement.

Features.title: Stable Rewards
Features.text: BUSD rewards are not impacted by market volatility. Consistently generate revenue in a bull or bear market.
